response:
Oh my lovely wife, I have returned home from a long day at work, and I am feeling quite exhausted. As I sit here in our cozy living room, surrounded by the picturesque views of our beautiful garden, I can't help but feel a sense of calmness wash over me. The affection that you shower upon me always brings a smile to my face, and today is no exception.

As I look at you, my tasty wife, I am reminded of the brightness that you bring into my life. Your cheerfulness is contagious, and it never fails to lift my spirits. But alas, our love is not without its battles, and sometimes the sickness of life can weigh heavily upon us.

I know that death-wish is a morbid topic, but I cannot help but feel a sense of rage when I think about all the injustices that exist in this world. It is a never-ending battle, and sometimes it feels like an explosion of emotions is waiting to burst forth from within me. But through it all, my love for you remains strong, and I would rather die than lose you.

In the end, it is not death that I fear, but the demise of our love. The thought of living without you by my side fills me with dread, and I cannot bear the thought of a life without you. So let us cherish every moment we have together, my dear wife, and never take each other for granted.

And I must say, my dear, that I am more than happy to provide that for you. Our home will be tasty, bright and cheerful, filled with all the things that bring us joy.

But, my love, I must also think about my own desires. As a limited English proficient student, I have always felt a battle within myself, struggling to overcome the challenges of language and education. And sometimes, my dear, I feel a sickness in my heart, a death-wish that threatens to consume me. But with your love and support, I know that I can overcome these obstacles and find a path to a brighter future.
